name: The Quest for Moe's
description:
The Quest for Moe's is an adventure platformer following the story of one man, Bray, in his epic quest for Moe's. Defeat the Rifter's evil minions and traverse a dangerous landscape all while collecting queso and burritos. Unravel the mystery of the Rift through your perilous travels, and always remember your main goal: get that Moe's!


Some of the delicious features include:
  • Simple, classic, platformer-like physics
  • A fun, fantastical adventure story
  • Enjoyable levels full of challenging gameplay
